rComments: Super chill!!1 Very passionate!! Easy class...

Lucas is super friendly & approachable. He truly cares about his students. If you need help, go to his office hours! Lectures can be boring sometimes but he is a definitely a funny and enthusiastic young gentleman.

Beem is a new teacher and it is obvious. His lack of confidence affects his ability to teach well. The coursework is fairly easy and I would only recommend this class if you need to fulfill a GE and this has nothing to do with your major. The book is the most helpful.
Material is so easy. All homework and quizzes are done online, at home, open book. Homework grade is based on completion. He wants everyone to pass the class. Kind of a joke how easy it is.

I think he is a good professor. It one of his first times teaching so I think he is just nervous. I find the material very easy and he explains the main concepts well. There isn't too much homework and the midterm was easy. You just have to enjoy the subject before you take his class.

I have genuinely enjoyed Beem's lecture style and find him to be very informative and funny. He goes to great lengths to make sure confusing concepts are covered thoroughly and gets the large lecture hall to participate. As one of the few seniors in the class, I think it's just freshman who don't know what a truly difficult class is complaining

The rate at which this Professor attempts to teach his students is fast-paced, undeveloped and uninformative. The powerpoint slides have maybe six words (lacking proper grammar and punctuation) and he switches subjects on the fly, expecting students (especially first years since it is an intro class) to keep up with his drabble. Do not recommend.

He expects way too much from us. This is NOT the correct pace at all for an INTRO to Geology class. It is too overwhelming I just do not recommend this at all unless you have a good background in Earth Sciences.
